snippet.title: Schwarzerblitz - Steam Edition launch trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1287800/Schwarzerblitz/
Fight like in the '90s, with this love letter to 3D polygonal arcade fighting games! 8-way movment, long combos, 27 characters to choose from, plus local multiplayer, arcade modes, story, training, tutorial, trials and much more! Available for free on Steam from June 2020!

* Features *
- 27 playable characters
- 40 stages (some with ring out)
- more than 100 skins (on average, 4-5 per character)
- a 5h long kinetic novel-like story mode, subdivided into 23 chapters
- classic arcade ending integrated with story mode
- local multiplayer + support for Steam Remote Play, with input lag settings to even the playfield
- 3D movement + Guard button, like SoulCalibur or Virtua Fighter
- all the classic arcade modes, plus some extra addition (time attack, survival, first hit...)
- a star-spangled wrestler lobster
- a drunken sharkman
- a politically incorrect robot

Join the fight in the official Discord server: https://discord.gg/vXKrvpV and rock the '90s!

[The source code of version 1.1 of the game (without the Steam SDK implementation and the latest bug fixes) is available at https://github.com/AndreaJens/SchwarzerblitzEngine under the terms of the BSL 2.0. The assets included in the repository are not licensed for redistribution.]

Music in the video: "The Beach (Original Mix)" by Astral (c) copyright 2015 - Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (3.0) license. http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/Astral/50472 Ft: Platinum Butterfly
